Sales Representative Job at Kokolet Luxury




        
    

        
        Kokolet Luxury is your premier destination for high-end sneakers and apparel. Specializing in new and classic Jordans, Dunks, Air Force, and more, we pride ourselves on offering a diverse range of styles to cater to every taste. At Kokolet Luxury, authenticity is our hallmark. We are committed to providing only genuine products, ensuring that our customers receive the quality they deserve.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Representative

Job Location: Lekki Phase 1, Lagos

Requirements
     

            
    




	ND/HND
	Island Based
	Must be Punctual
	Sales & Fashion idea
	Effective Communication Skills
	Team Work.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should submit their CV to: work@kokoletluxury.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
